name: htmlstonizer
description: Save HTML fragment in Blockchain to assure the unmodifiability of your assessments.
author: Michele Mastrogiovanni <michele.mastrogiovanni@gmail.com>

scripts.build: microbundle     -i main.js -f umd --name htmlstonizer -o dist --inline all
scripts.dev: microbundle watch -i main.js -f umd --name htmlstonizer -o dist --inline all
